overview: The story of Sergio "Checo" Perez as it's never been told before.  Successes and failures that led him to be one of the best pilots in the world.  Sergio Perez's career has been spectacular throughout his 12 years in Formula 1; in this documentary the Mexican talks about his dreams and how difficult it has been to reach the top in the pinnacle of motorsport.
title: Checo: Never Give Up
